items.summary: Apply a global SHQ theme across the entire app (all pages/tabs) using a dark navy base with light green accents, using IMG_0109.jpeg as a visual style reference only (do not set it as the literal background image). Update the global Tailwind/CSS theme tokens so that backgrounds, cards, borders, and focus rings consistently reflect the new palette while maintaining readable contrast in both light and dark modes.

Update the top navigation/menu placement to match the uploaded reference layout style: render the main tab menu as a centered, rounded, translucent 'pill' navigation bar near the top (aligned with the header area), with clear active state and spacing similar to IMG_0109.jpeg, while keeping the existing set of tabs, permissions (admin-only Users tab), and navigation behavior unchanged.

Refine the header + page background treatment to align with the SHQ look: use a subtle dark navy gradient/texture-like feel (CSS-based, not the uploaded image) and harmonize Header, main container, and Footer backgrounds so the layout feels like one cohesive system while keeping existing content and functionality unchanged.
